<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grippli Glide](/Feats.aspx?ID=2822) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Windweb Grippli](/Heritages.aspx?ID=178) heritage

**Requirements**
You must have at least one hand free.

</column>

---

You can use your webbed feet to guide your fall. You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down (10 feet if you don't have both hands free) and up to 25 feet forward through the air. As long as you spend at least 1 action gliding each round and have not yet reached the ground, you remain in the air at the end of your turn.
name: Grippli Glide
requirement: You must have at least one hand free.
